title: Easter Attacks : SJB assures new government will renew investigations
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Sri Lankan Opposition Leader Sajith Premadasa told the Parliament that he informed the Archbishop in writing that a future government will renew investigations to punish those responsible for the Easter Sunday attacks.
The letter to His Eminence Malcolm Cardinal Ranjith was made public and can be seen below.
